alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:07PM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley, Southern Tularosa Basin and Otero Mesa. In Texas, Western El Paso County, Eastern/Central El Paso County, Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains, Salt Basin and Southern Hudspeth Highlands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
